data.system_settings: iPhone 6s iOS 12.1 Dev Beta 5 Windows 10 Home x64 1803
data.actual_result: Discord changes theme, but reopens the last page you were on in server settings
data.expected_result: Discord changes theme on your phoneD
data.short_description: Changing theme on another device will reopen most recent page in server settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord on your phone, and go into the server settings of a server you can see settings in - Open any page in server settings, and then close that page, but leave the main server settings page open - On another device, go into appearance settings and change the theme - Observe the server settings on your phone as you change theme
